dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your books and marketing content

descriptions.recentBooksDesc: Your recently uploaded and analyzed books
descriptions.recentContentDesc: Your latest generated social media posts
descriptions.generateFirstContent: Generate your first social media content from your books.

books.title: My Books
books.uploadDescription: Upload your books to start creating marketing content

hero.title: The #1 Full Stack
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to launch your next big idea with authentication, payments, database, and more - start building today.

features.title: Start with a complete foundation
features.subtitle: No more setup headaches. Clone the repo and start building your product immediately.

auth.title: Authentication Ready
auth.description: Clerk authentication pre-configured with protected routes, user management, and session handling.

payments.title: Payments Integration
payments.description: Stripe integration with webhook support, subscription management, and checkout flows.

database.title: Database Setup
database.description: PostgreSQL with Drizzle ORM configured and ready. Includes migrations and type-safe queries.

ui.title: Modern UI Components
ui.description: Beautiful, accessible components with shadcn/ui. Dark mode support and Tailwind CSS v4.

typescript.title: TypeScript First
typescript.description: Full TypeScript support with strict mode, path aliases, and type safety throughout.

analytics.title: Analytics Built-in
analytics.description: PostHog analytics integration for tracking user behavior and product metrics.

cta.title: Ready to build something amazing?
cta.subtitle: Stop wasting time on boilerplate. Clone this template and start shipping your product today.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the template

whatIsThis.question: What is this template?
whatIsThis.answer: A complete full-stack application template built with Next.js, TypeScript, and modern tools to help you ship faster.

howToStart.question: How do I get started?
howToStart.answer: Clone the repository, install dependencies, configure your environment variables, and start building.

isItFree.question: Is it free to use?
isItFree.answer: Yes, this template is completely free and open source under the MIT license.

supportIncluded.question: Is support included?
supportIncluded.answer: Community support is available through GitHub issues and discussions.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for you

socialProof.title: Trusted by developers
socialProof.subtitle: Join thousands of developers who have built amazing products with this template

video.title: See it in action
